entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 24 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 24 by morning. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 22. POP 30%
